original_text: To reach the Philistines, he had to go along a narrow valley. There were high rocks on both sides of the road. The name of one rock was ‘Bozez’. The name of the other rock was ‘Seneh’.
korean_text: 요나단이 블레셋 사람들에게로 건너가려 하는 어귀 사이 이쪽에는 험한 바위가 있고 저쪽에도 험한 바위가 있는데 하나의 이름은 보세스요 하나의 이름은 세네라

sentences.original_text: he had to go along a narrow valley
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 좁은 계곡을 따라 가야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: on both sides of the road
The name of one rock was 'Bozez'
The name of the other rock was 'Seneh'
